biotools.summary:
docker4seq provides a general schema and an infrastructure to distribute robust and reproducible workflows. It guarantees to final users the ability to repeat consistently any analysis independently by the used UNIX-like architecture.
docker4seq R package contains all the R functions required to handle all the steps of RNAseq and miRNA-seq workflow.
